title: Privacy Policy
p1: This app is published by the International Christian Churches for religious and educational purposes. It is designed to share and express Christian teachings and does not collect any personal information from users.
p2: No personal data collected: The app does not request, store, or transmit any personal information.
p3: No tracking: The app does not use analytics, cookies, or any tracking tools.
p4: No permissions required: The app does not access your camera, microphone, location, contacts, or any other device features.
p5: The app may be used by all ages.
p6: Since no information is collected, there is no risk of exposing children's personal information.
p7: The app may contain links to official church websites or media channels. These sites are not controlled by the app, and their privacy practices are independent of this app.
p8: Any future changes to this Privacy Policy will be reflected in the app or on the App Store listing.
p9: For questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact:
